segments.text: Mary and Tom are breaking up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's unbelievable ! They are only married for one month . Then who is at fault ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mary said she couldn't put up with Tom , for he fell in love with another woman .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think they'll become reconciled ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't think so . She said she would rather be single than cope with an unhappy marriage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a shame ! Their marriage is really a mistake .
segments.speaker: S2
